channel.title: Shooting Planes on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Shooting Planes on Game6r

item.title: Game Air battles
item.description: An air duel over the hot desert awaits you. The sun is shining brightly, and there is not a cloud in the blue sky. Dozens of fighters are fighting in the hot air. At the helm of one of them you have to fight. In the arsenal there is a machine gun with endless ammo, a couple of homing missiles and a dozen bombs.
